Automate personalized patient interaction and provide AI-powered communication throughout the patient journey. Eliminate the need for clinical staff to draft detailed and tedious responses to patient inquiries. 

Your Benefits: 
✅ Greater efficiency through decreased workload for the clinical staff
✅ Increased patient conversion through faster and personalized responses 

How Does It Work?
👉 Generate Automated Responses - Simply highlight the patient inquiry in your browser and receive a fully personalized response within seconds to send to the patient.    
👉 Customize To Your Practice Needs - Insert practice-specific information such as treatment prices, parking information, and more to fully customize the responses to your practice.
👉 Use For All Your Use Cases - Utilize the solution for all major use cases, including emails, self-tests, and contact forms. Through the browser, you can use the solution flexibly for a variety of channels.

Frequently Asked Questions:

❓How do I use ZEISS VisioGen?
Use the solution in three easy steps:  
1) Mark the patient inquiry text on your browser, 
2) Click the browser plugin popup, and 
3) Review the generated response and copy and paste the answer to send to your patient.  

❓How is the quality of the answers secured?
All answers must be reviewed by your staff before being copied, ensuring the safety of all responses.
 
❓How much does ZEISS VisioGen cost?
During the trial period, the solution is free of charge.
